item.title: QS
item.description: score:45 Chances: QuantumScape and Canoo are both innovative companies in their own right, but only one can be the best EV stock to buy. The EV battery maker just got good news about its solid-state battery. Is it a buy? QuantumScape is trying to address a big point of hesitancy from potential EV customers.
